author: cnbc.com
title: New Director Joins iMining
text:
VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- iMining Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Inc. (formerly Parlane Resource Corp.) (TSXV:IMIN) (“iMining” or the “Company”) announces that Mr. Anders Nilsson has been appointed an additional director of the Company. Mr. Nilsson, a resident of Stockholm, Sweden, is a certified Systems Engineer who provides management and technology consulting services. He is presently engaged by the largest helicopter operator in Sweden to develop and implement a safety and operations management platform for compliance with European legislation. He also currently mines for cryptocurrencies on his own behalf, having researched and implemented a business model for his operations. Mr. Nilsson’s appointment to the Board follows the resignation of Ken Sumanik, who has served the Company for the last five years. The Board is grateful for Mr. Sumanik’s contributions and wishes him well in his retirement.
“We are extremely fortunate to have Mr. Nilsson on board iMining,” said Robert Eadie, President and CEO of the Company. “iMining will be forging ahead into the exciting blockchain and cryptocurrency world and having Anders with us will be a definite asset.”
ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD
iMining Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Inc.
Signed “Robert Eadie”
Robert Eadie, President, Chief Executive Officer and Director
